nodes.text: The IB-94 blaster pistol was a blaster pistol manufactured by BlasTech Industries. During his time as a bounty hunter, the Mandalorian Din Djarin carried an IB-94 that served as his primary sidearm.

The IB-94 first appeared in Chapter 1 of the 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 12, 2019. Its design is based off the Bergmann 1894 No. 1 semi-automatic pistol, albeit with some modifications.
